snippet: Careful selection of window dressings can make even a dull view less of a price-killer.
abstract: Market Ready Q&A offers tips on how to deal with windows that open onto an air shaft, in order to make an apartment for sale look as appealing as possible.
lead_paragraph: Careful selection of window dressings can make even a dull view less of a price-killer.

headline.seo: Selling an Apartment With a View Onto an Air Shaft
